item.title: Where to start
item.description: Learn something new everyday and share something now and then Some useful tutorial This section serves at providing a start point for newbees. We need a fundamental understanding of some general concepts, an overview of the big picture, most frequently used tools, services, etc. Linux basics One of the most comprehensive knowledge base about linux operating system and various of linux tools, softwares, services, I found so far, is the redhat documentation.
